executable.title: DeformImage
executable.description: Generates MS artificial lesions by deforming Input Image on regions defined by Input Mask
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos da Silva Senra Filho (CSIM - USP - RP), Fabricio Henrique Simozo (CSIM - USP - RP)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grant NXNNXXNNNNNN-NNXN

double.name: sigma
double.label: Sigma
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm
